questions.question_text: An organization has sustained significant losses from a series of cyber events. Which of the following control types would MOST likely help reduce further losses?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Preventive controls

questions.question_text: What is the MOST important information provided by key performance indicators (KPIs) in a risk management program?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
KPI Measures performance of risk owners/processes
KRI Measures risk exposure and early warnings
KCI Measures effectiveness of controls

Selected Answer: A
A. Effectiveness of internal controls.

Monitoring KPIs allows organizations to assess how well their controls are functioning in managing and mitigating risks. The effectiveness of internal controls is crucial for ensuring that the organization can achieve its objectives while minimizing the impact of potential risks.
Performance in C means effectiveness. But the control just contains data loss. A mentions all internal controls.

questions.question_text: A large organization plans to take advantage of cloud computing to reduce costs; however, there are data-use restrictions that require certain data to remain on premise. Which cloud model should the risk practitioner recommend for this deployment?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Hybrid cloud

questions.question_text: Which of the following provides the BEST assurance that an organization will be able to defend against cyber attacks?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Penetration testing

questions.question_text: While participating in a scenario analysis exercise, a risk practitioner was asked to determine the reputational impact of a system outage. Which of the following would be the BEST approach?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. Work with the business to estimate the number and value of lost customers.

choices.D: Work with the business to estimate the number and value of lost customers.
choices.C: Report the value as high because cyber reputational impacts are significant.
choices.A: Determine the likelihood of negative media coverage and social media response.
choices.B: Calculate impact from third-party concerns about contractual obligations related to the outage.
